import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; export default function TicketAdd() { const history = useHistory(); const [ticketData, setTicketData] = useState({ passenger: "", schedule: "", seatNumber: "", price: "", status: "confirmed", paymentMethod: "cash" }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setTicketData({ ...ticketData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("New Ticket Data:", ticketData); alert("Ticket added successfully!"); history.push("/admin/tickets"); }; const handleCancel = () => { history.push("/admin/tickets"); }; return ( <>
